articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 11 - A Trigger Covered with Scratches! Detective Saeko Loved
articles.description: Saeko meets her ex-lover Asakura who is an agent from Interpol. He asks for her help to apprehend a murder suspect who has escaped to Japan.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 3 - Combination of puzzlement & recovery! Memories are a distant light
articles.description: Ryo comes across a stuntwoman named Yuki who is trying to get her memory back by performing dangerous stunts. She believes Yuki is being hypnotised by someone.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 2 - Farewell, Kaori! Arrest Warrant for the City Hunter
articles.description: Kaori overhears a phone conversation between Ryo and Saeko after which she realises that she has rented her room to a detective whose motive is to arrest Ryo.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 10 - A wedding dress for Christmas (Part 1)
articles.description: Ryo and Kaori receive a strange request from the head of the Yamaoka family looking to retrieve his daughter, Tsubaki from the son of the rival Umino family, Kazuhiko.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 4 - Love is also an A-license. The beautiful wheelman visiting the store!
articles.description: Ryo is chased by the police as they think he is the underwear thief. He escapes with the help of Miyuki.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 1 - De-Mokkori Declaration: XYZ Saves The World
articles.description: Ryo and Kaori protect a Rubirian Embassy worker striving not only to salvage the environment of her homeland, but also to expose a smuggling ring in which a Rubirian Embassy Environmental official is involved.

articles.description: A beautiful pianist comes to Tokyo for a charity concert, and City Hunter is there. But music isn't his forte-Joe wants lessons in the language of love. Typically, though, things don't go his way. A foreign dignitary is assassinated in cold blood; secret agen…

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 13 - Lullaby requiem. The young nobleman who came from a distant country
articles.description: Kaori befriends an Austrian orphan, Hans Zeigfried who is a professional killer and dying from a fatal disease. Kaori is abducted by Hans' enemies.

articles.title: City Hunter '91 - Episode 9 - The Place Where Gun Smoke Goes. City Hunter Dies at Dawn
articles.description: Ryo and Umibozu fight at a graveyard while Sonia learns about the challenge between her father and Ryo from Miki.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 11 - A wedding dress for Christmas (Part 2)
articles.description: Tsubaki and Kazuhiko attempt to flee their country to evade the wrath of their parents but are attacked by a helicopter in the process.

articles.title: City Hunter 3 - Episode 9 - Love Forecast of Rain then Shine: The Beautiful Newscaster's Umbrella of Love
articles.description: Ryo is hired by a female weather reporter to protect her against a deranged fan.
